originalText.text: Dr. Lalla is very friendly, admirable, and professional. She uses very simple language to explain my surgery procedure. After the surgery, she keeps texting me, asking how I am doing. She truly cares about her patients. I'm fortunate to be her patient.

text.text: Dr. Lalla is very friendly, admirable, and professional. She uses very simple language to explain my surgery procedure. After the surgery, she keeps texting me, asking how I am doing. She truly cares about her patients. I'm fortunate to be her patient.

originalText.text: Dr. Lalla was very attentive and caring. Made herself personally available for my concerns and explained things thoroughly. Now I understand how pleasant a trip to the dentist can be!

text.text: Dr. Lalla was very attentive and caring. Made herself personally available for my concerns and explained things thoroughly. Now I understand how pleasant a trip to the dentist can be!

originalText.text: Her was thorough and explained each step of the surgery as well as the after care. She also contacted me the next day to check in. I’ve never had such a caring, professional experience. Thank you

originalText.text: Dr. Lalla is absolutely fantastic. She's thorough, caring, and communicative. I always feel that I'm in very good hands in her care, and I've been seeing her for my periodontal issues for over 12 years.

text.text: Dr. Lalla is absolutely fantastic. She's thorough, caring, and communicative. I always feel that I'm in very good hands in her care, and I've been seeing her for my periodontal issues for over 12 years.

originalText.text: Dr. Lalla is very professional and knowledgeable.  She spends time explaining the patient's condition and her treatment plan in detail. She is really very nice, friendly and I feel very comfortable every time when I see her.
